content: make my #crochetsocks tag @thegracefultangle pattern i hope it has left you feeling inspired and motivated to continue enjoying the art of knitting and crochet but even more importantly always remember that no matter who you are what you ve been through what you re going through or what you will go through god loves you he loves you so much that he sent his one and only son jesus to die on the cross for your sins the decision to follow him will be the most important and the most rewarding decision you ll ever make he loves you satisfaction socks | page 4 of 4
